name: 3D Tank Racing - Race Around Track
description:
3D Tank Racing - Race Around Track Avoiding Black Flags and Collecting Blue and Red Flags. Race Avoiding Penalties. How Fast Can You Complete Circuit? 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time. Control to Move Left and Right. Up Control to Accelerate. Down Control to Reverse. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. Rival Tanks on the Attack. FREE Version - New Soundtrack - Added Jumps! New: Rival Tanks on the Attack. New: Stunt Jumps Through Hoops of Fire. New: Awesome Soundtrack. FREE Version. *****Please Rate*****
